articles.title: Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Is DPRK's Invariable Stand
articles.content:
Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Is DPRK's Invariable Stand
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- It is the invariable stand of the DPRK to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula, said the head of the DPRK delegation to the 68th UN General Assembly. He said this at a high-level debate on nuclear disarmament which was held as part of the General Assembly on the initiative of member nations of the Non-Alignment Movement on Thursday. 
					 It is a matter of paramount importance for world peace and security to prevent nuclear arms race and denuclearize the world through nuclear disarmament at present, he said, and went on:
					
					 Now the development of new nuclear weapons and improvement of the quality of nukes continue under the signboard of nuclear disarmament. Even the attempts to stage preemptive attacks with nukes on those countries with differing political ideas and social systems are getting evermore undisguised. 
					
					 The situation goes to prove that to take substantial measures for nuclear disarmament is more important than anything else. 
					
					 The nuclear disarmament should aim at the total dismantlement of nukes. For the present, a binding document of international law should immediately be enacted to totally ban the use of nukes and to unconditionally give assurances of non-use of nukes to non nuclear states. 
					
					 The U.S. should take the lead in the work for nuclear disarmament as it is the first user of nuclear weapon and the biggest holder of those weapons in the world. 
					
					 The further allowance of the anachronistic theory, which specifies anyone with nukes is eligible to act as it pleases, will surely encourage the non nuclear nations to opt for possessing nuclear deterrent. 
					
					 The nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula was caused by the U.S. as it deployed nukes in south Korea and has posed nuclear war threats to the DPRK pursuant to its hostile policy toward Pyongyang. 
					
					 The final target of denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is to totally remove the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK and make the whole area of the peninsula including south Korea free from nuclear weapons. 
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the DPRK to achieve peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue of the peninsula through dialogue and negotiations without precondition. 
					
					 The DPRK will positively join the efforts of the member nations to achieve denuclearization of the world through nuclear disarmament in the future, too.

articles.title: DPRK Delegate Makes Speech at G-77 FM Meeting
articles.content:
DPRK Delegate Makes Speech at G-77 FM Meeting
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government will actively join the G-77 in the common efforts to establish new international economic relations on the basis of justice, equality and impartiality in the future, too. The DPRK delegate said this in his speech at the annual meeting of foreign ministers of the G-77 on Thursday. 
					 He said that the developing countries have made continuous efforts to achieve the internationally agreed development goals including the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) and registered many successes in the course. 
					
					 But, big challenges still lie ahead of the developing countries to abolish poverty and achieve sustainable economic development, he said, and went on:
					
					 The situation requires the G-77 to strengthen common efforts more than ever before to tide over the difficulties and challenges lying ahead of the developing countries and create favorable condition and circumstances for economic and social development. 
					
					 Due attentions should be directed to the following issues in formulating the common stand of the G-77 on the major economic and social problems including the post-2015 development agenda to be discussed in the 68th UN General Assembly. 
					
					 First, top priority should be given to protecting and ensuring sovereignty and right to develop of the developing countries. 
					
					 Second, substantial measures should be taken for establishment of the fair international economic relations. 
					
					 Third, South-South cooperation should be activated. 
					
					 Now under way in the DPRK is a vigorous drive to build an economic power, an advanced and highly civilized nation on the basis of knowledge-based economy in the near future under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The DPRK's efforts for economic construction will be a significant contribution to the efforts of the international community to achieve the MDGs and other development goals already agreed worldwide as well as sustainable development.

articles.title: DPRK Will Continue Working Hard for Peace: DPRK Delegate
articles.content:
DPRK Will Continue Working Hard for Peace: DPRK Delegate
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The head of the DPRK delegation made a speech at the ministerial meeting of the non-aligned movement held on the sidelines of the 68th UN General Assembly on Friday.
					 Over the past 50 odd years since its founding the NAM has made persistent efforts to establish the just and fair international relations under the banner of independence and equality, he said, and went on:
					
					 High-handed and arbitrary acts based on the logic of strength are still practiced in international relations and the principles of respect for sovereignty, equal sovereignty and non-interference in the internal affairs of other countries which are specified in the UN Charter and norms of international law governing the relations among countries are being wantonly violated.
					
					 Interference in internal affairs of sovereign countries, encroachment upon sovereignty, armed invasion and terrorist acts are being committed in an unbroken chain under the pretext of "anti-terrorism" and "prevention of proliferation."
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that the peaceful and legitimate right of sovereign countries to develop outer space is called into question by the UN Security Council and a plane with a head of state aboard was grounded on an absurd charge.
					
					 Victims of the extreme high-handed and arbitrary practices are members of the NAM without exception.
					
					 For the NAM to drastically increase its position and role as political forces representing the interests of the developing countries, first it is necessary to further strengthen support and solidarity with the efforts of the member nations for defending sovereignty.
					
					 Second, it is imperative to increase the capability for joint actions to defend the interests of the member nations on the world stage including the UN.
					
					 If the NAM member nations which account for the overwhelming majority of the UN member nations get united for joint actions, they can have great political influence on fairly settling the issue of UN reform and other major issues for global peace, security, disarmament and human rights.
					
					 It is the consistent stand and fixed will of the DPRK to ensure peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and reunify the country by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The DPRK has recently proposed high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S. to have wide-ranging and frank discussions of the issues of defusing the tension on the Korean Peninsula and replacing the armistice mechanism by a peace one.
					
					 The DPRK will continue working hard to defend peace and stability.
					
					 It will continue responsible and patient efforts to achieve reconciliation, cooperation and reunification between the north and the south in the idea of "By our nation itself", holding high the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Those Who Slander Dignity of DPRK Will Meet Stern Punishment: CPRK
articles.content:
Those Who Slander Dignity of DPRK Will Meet Stern Punishment: CPRK
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Sunday as regards the fact that the south Korean traitorous regime committed the hideous crime of malignantly slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system in the DPRK:
					 Shortly ago, the puppet regime let the pseudo research institute called the Asan Policy Institute invite to Seoul self-styled experts from the U.S. and surrounding countries and hold the farce of slandering and defiling the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system in the DPRK while making such rubbish as "instability" and "possibility of collapse".
					
					 Yonhap News and other conservative media of south Korea echoed nonsensical remarks made by media, experts and scholars of the third country, building up the public opinion critical of the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, Segye Ilbo, E-Daily and other media cited the content of report worked out by an institute of the U.S., vociferating about "area of responsibility", "boundary line" and "confidential negotiations".
					
					 This is a serious insult to the dignity and the social system of the DPRK and another unpardonable provocation.
					
					 As for the "theory of collapse" touted by the puppet regime, it was raised several times by senseless guys devoid of elementary judging ability only to be snubbed.
					
					 When the DPRK was making the arduous march, the enemies became vocal that the north will not last long. They set afloat "3, 3, 3" timetable, saying that the north will collapse in three days or three months, three years at best.
					
					 Decades have passed since then and the reality is beyond imagination.
					
					 Satellites lifted off in succession and epoch-making miracles were wrought and hurrahs for the Workers' Party of Korea and socialism reverberate far and wide amid high civilization under socialism thanks to popular policies, making the enemies shudder.
					
					 The DPRK is making steady victorious progress, demonstrating its dignity as socialism of Juche, far from collapsing as claimed by the puppet regime.
					
					 Absolute is the trust of the army and people of the DPRK in their leader and invincible is Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses which the army and people regard as their life and soul. This is a stark reality.
					
					 The DPRK has reached the highest ground in its might and spirit under the outstanding guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and the people are full of confidence and optimism about tomorrow when they will fully enjoy luxury and prosperity under socialism.
					
					 But the mentally deranged men are letting loose absurd sophism like "collapse" in denial of the stirring and proud reality of the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the south Korean regime which is on the verge of collapse.
					
					 South Korea is plagued with extreme political confusion and crisis.
					
					 The south Koreans' resentment and curses are running sky-high due to the regime which brings untold misfortune and disaster through sycophantic treachery, confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular rule. The ruling system is, therefore, shaken down to its very foundation.
					
					 However, the regime is saying this or that about other, a tragicomedy which will make even a cat laugh.
					
					 The puppet regime's disgusting behavior of echoing the rubbish made by senseless guys reveals how much it is seized by the perception of confrontation between social systems.
					
					 The absurd story about "collapse of the north" is a last-ditch effort of those taken aback by the spirit of the illustrious commander of Songun, might of the single-minded unity of the army and people and the high prestige of the DPRK. It is a foolish fanatic to tarnish the image of socialist Korea of Juche.
					
					 But no one will lend an ear to the absurd rubbish.
					
					 The DPRK will eternally prosper, always winning victories by dint of youthful vigor and strong spirit.
					
					 The regime which dares run amuck to hurt the dignity and social system in the DPRK and those who take part in such acts, be they journalist, scholar, expert and news announcer, should clearly know that they will have to pay dear prices for their acts.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never tolerate but mercilessly punish those who slander even a bit the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system of the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings from Iranian President
articles.content:
Greetings from Iranian President
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Hassan Rouhani, president of Iran, on September 9.
					 The message extended heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of its founding anniversary.
					
					 It hoped that the bilateral relations would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples thanks to the common efforts and cooperation of high-ranking officials of the Islamic Republic of Iran and the DPRK and that eternal peace and stability of the world would be achieved.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and the government and people of the DPRK happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Floral Basket from IIJI Secretary General
articles.content:
Floral Basket from IIJI Secretary General
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the visiting secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and his party.
					 The floral basket was handed to Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is chairman of the Social Scientists Society of Korea, by IIJI Secretary General Kenichi Ogami on Saturday.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the China-Korea Friendship Association headed by Chairman Wu Donghe and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who made undying contributions to accomplishing global independence, before their statues.
					
					 They entered the hall where Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the Generalissimos received are on display and the halls which house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.
					
					 The head of the delegation of the China-Korea Friendship Association wrote in the visitor's book that the great men will be immortal and their feats will shine long.

articles.title: Football Match Held between Art Studios
articles.content:
Football Match Held between Art Studios 
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- There was a football match between officials of the Art Studio of the Korean People's Army and the Mansudae Art Studio at the football field newly built at the Mansudae Art Studio on Sunday with the sports enthusiasm sweeping across the country.
					 Players showed excellent sports technique they have trained through popular sports activities in high spirit.
					
					 Officials of the Mansudae Art Studio won 2:0 in the football match.
					
					 Artists of the two studios held a sketching game.
					
					Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Jang Jong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, officials concerned and officials, creators and employees of the studios.

articles.title: US Watchword of "World without Nuclear Weapons" under Fire
articles.content:
US Watchword of "World without Nuclear Weapons" under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The present U.S. administration has spoken loudly of its plan to realize the "world without nuclear weapons" from the outset of its office.
					 It has been busy discussing the "nuclear non-proliferation" and proposing "cuts of nuclear weapons".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 The watchword of "the world without nuclear weapons" put up by the U.S. administration is nothing but a camouflage to hide its ambition to dominate the world with its nuclear edge.
					
					 The U.S. has pushed ahead with the development of the new type nukes behind the signboard of "building the world without nuclear weapons". But "nuclear non-proliferation" and "cuts of nuclear weapons" much touted by the U.S. are all hypocrisy that stirs up ridicule.
					
					 Over 200 nukes possessed by Israel are a product of the U.S. stealthy proliferation of nuclear technology.
					
					 The U.S. is entirely to blame for the ever-mounting nuclear threat and the danger of nuclear war in the world. It continues conducting nuclear tests being bent on developing the nukes, while keeping mum about the nuclear development of its followers and allies and helping them do it in every way. In the meantime, it is crying out for such watchwords as the "nuclear non-proliferation" and "cuts of nuclear weapons", sophism that can convince no one.
					
					 Washington is desperately seeking to loosen the vigilance of its potential rivals and weaken their nuclear forces to the maximum and build the uni-polar world backed by nuclear upper-hand while recklessly going ahead with the modernization of its nukes. But this is just a daydream.
					
					 No country in the world will believe in the U.S. watchword of "world without nuclear weapons".
					
					 The U.S. should stop trumpeting about the spurious watchword and make a bold and real decision to dismantle its nukes.

articles.title: Provocative Remarks of Representative of "Saenuri Party" Slammed
articles.content:
Provocative Remarks of Representative of "Saenuri Party" Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Hwang U Ryo, representative of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, made such provocative remarks that the north is defending those people involved in the attempted rebellion and it is a meddling in the internal affairs of south Korea.
					 Minju Joson Sunday comments on this as follows:
					
					 The DPRK's taking issue with the south Korean puppet regime's conspiracies against it and the regime's brutal crackdown on pro-reunification patriots can never be a meddling in its internal affairs.
					
					 It is the south Korean puppet regime which interferes in the internal affairs of the DPRK.
					
					 The present south Korean authorities negate the social system of the DPRK and cry out for the "change of its social system" whenever an opportunity presents itself.
					
					 Hwang let out a string of invectives against the policy and line of the DPRK, talking about "the north's meddling in the internal affairs of south Korea" and trumpeting about "leading the north to change".
					
					 The facts show that the south Korean puppet regime, which has blocked the improvement of the inter-Korean ties while resorting to confrontation with fellow countrymen, war maneuvers and fascist suppression, is so frightened by the decisive measure of the DPRK that it talked nonsense.
					
					 The DPRK's sincere efforts to warm the relations with south Korea is to end the misfortune and sufferings of all the compatriots caused by the national partition by bringing earlier independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the regime misjudged the efforts and self-restraint of the DPRK to abuse them for escalating confrontation with it. This resulted in such a deplorable situation as now.
					
					 The conservative group has to make an apology to the nation, reflecting on its sins.
					
					 The regime, however, desperately seeks to shift the responsibility for the prevailing situation on to the DPRK to continue doing harm to it.
					
					 It must stop using such bad and ridiculous language as "the north's interference in the internal affairs of south Korea", and discontinue its sinister act of meddling in the internal affairs of the DPRK aimed at changing its social system.

articles.title: US Gangster-like Demand for Upkeep of Forces in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
US Gangster-like Demand for Upkeep of Forces in S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- At least 30 organizations of south Korea including the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, the Solidarity for Progress and the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society held a press conference in Seoul on Sept. 25.
					 The speakers at the conference disclosed that over 1.4 trillion won of expenses paid by south Korea for the upkeep of the U.S. forces have been diverted for other purposes.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. is moving to force the south Korean authorities to bear more than a trillion won for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea at the negotiations for a special agreement on sharing the expenses, they said.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. side was originally to cover the cost for the upkeep of its forces in south Korea, they said that it is an unacceptable humiliation to provide the U.S. forces with the huge amount of money for which south Korea holds no responsibility.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to stop the illegal and unjust negotiations, recollect the upkeep misused by the U.S. forces and abolish the special agreement.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Teachers Union Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Teachers Union Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress in south Korea in a statement on September 26 demanded the puppet authorities stop suppression of the Teachers Union.
					 The pressure of the Ministry of Employment and Labor on the union to amend the present rules is undemocratic, the statement said.
					
					 Even an international body expressed concern over the stepped-up pressure of the authorities aimed to violate the legitimacy of the union, and recommended them to immediately halt it, it noted.
					
					 The authorities' suppression is part of the repressive campaign to quell the anti-"government" atmosphere running high due to the Intelligence Service's illegal interference in the election and political operation, it said.
					
					 It urged the "government" to stop suppression of the Teachers Union.

articles.title: Koreans in China Condemn S. Korean Regime for Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Koreans in China Condemn S. Korean Regime for Anti-DPRK Campaign
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on Friday strongly denounced the south Korean puppet regime for spoiling the hard-won atmosphere for inter-Korean dialogue and driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a dangerous catastrophe again.
					 The statement said:
					
					 When progress was made in mending the inter-Korean relations thanks to the sincere efforts by the DPRK, the south Korean regime made profound confusion of the right and wrong, claiming that it is a fruition of the "theory of principle". Worse still, it, far from pondering over the just and resolute step taken by the DPRK against the moves of abusing the inter-Korean relations for the sinister political purpose, revealed once again its confrontational nature, vociferating about "act against human ethics", "decisive retaliation" and "international sanctions".
					
					 This is a revelation of the confrontational hysteria to evade the blame for the present situation and do harm to the DPRK.
					
					 The basic principle in the inter-Korean relations is to meet the demand and interests common to the nation in the spirit of "By our nation itself" and the way of putting it into practice is to implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The puppet regime is trying to advertise "results of its policy toward the north" in a bid to calm down the protests of the people from all walks of life against the revival of the notorious "yusin" dictatorship and unpopular rule. But no one will be taken in by such poor sophism.
					
					 Koreans in China will scathingly reject the treacherous inhuman act of the south Korean regime and turn out as one in the just action to thoroughly preserve and implement the north-south joint declarations.

articles.title: Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Foreign Media Praise Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Public organizations of foreign countries posted articles on their websites on the 64th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea carried an article titled "Kim Jong Suk, Woman Admired Forever" on Sept. 11.
					
					 Kim Jong Suk embarked on the revolutionary struggle in her teens to save the country and nation, the article said, and went on:
					
					 She joined the Korean People's Revolutionary Army led by President Kim Il Sung at her early age and waged an armed struggle for ten years against the Japanese imperialists for the liberation of Korea and won the fame as a woman commander.
					
					 In battlefields of the anti-Japanese war she shielded the President with her own body, protecting him from danger.
					
					 To her the President was like the heart and destiny of Korea whom she had to safeguard at the cost of her life.
					
					 She lived a short life but she devoted her all to the safety and health of the President all her life.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea she reliably assured his safety as his guard.
					
					 The Korean people named several places and units of the country after her to hand down her exploits.
					
					 The website of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and the website of the Crimean Association for the Study of the Juche Idea of Ukraine posted articles dealing with her undying exploits under the headlines "Great Woman of Korea" and "Legendary Woman of Great Marksmanship" with her photos on Sept. 22.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked in Germany, Guinea
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked in Germany, Guinea
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar by the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, a lecture at the Guinean Art College and a reading session at a factory in Guinea on Sept. 20 and 23 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that the Korean army and people are making great achievements in building an economic power on a daily basis under the wise leadership of the WPK led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The dean of the Music Faculty of the Guinean Art College said First Secretary Kim Jong Un is the leader of the WPK called as the mother party by the people.
					
					 All his thinking and activities originate from his warm love for the people which has become the supreme principle and goal of his policy, the dean added.
					
					 A vice-manager of the factory in Guinea noted the WPK developed into a seasoned and invincible party which leads the people to victory despite any storms and difficulties and enjoyed support and trust from all the people under the sagacious leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Introduces Great National Unity in DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Introduces Great National Unity in DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its internet homepage an article titled "Tradition of Great Unity of Korean Nation" on Sept. 24 to mark the 6th anniversary of the historic October 4 declaration. 
					 The great unity of the entire Korean nation has deep roots, the article said, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, the anti-Japanese national united front, in May 1936. 
					
					 He convened the joint conference of representatives of political parties and public organizations in north and south of Korea in 1948 after the liberation of Korea to call upon all parties, sections and patriotic forces from all social standings in the north and the south to turn out in the struggle for independence and reunification of the country. 
					
					 He put forward the three principles of national reunification in the 1970s to lay a solid foundation for national unity and reunification of the country. He made public the work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" in April 1993. 
					
					 His idea of great national unity was successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to the bold decision of Kim Jong Il, the historic north-south summit was realized and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration which solemnly promised to solve the issue of the reunification of the country by the nation's own efforts was adopted, the first of its kind in the history of Korea since its division. 
					
					 The October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted to open the brighter prospect for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 Korea's reunification will surely be realized under the banner of the great national unity.

articles.title: Illegality of "UN Command" Disclosed by Foreign Websites
articles.content:
Illegality of "UN Command" Disclosed by Foreign Websites
 Pyongyang, September 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign websites posted articles disclosing the illegality of the "UN Command" cooked up by the U.S. by abusing the name of the United Nations. 
					 The German newspaper Die Tages Zeitung and the Institute for Globalization of Canada on Sept. 21 posted on their websites articles saying that the establishment and existence of the "UN Command" are in violation of the UN Charter. 
					
					 The articles said that the U.S. illegally made up the "UN Command" in disregard of the UN Charter in July 1950.
					
					 The articles went on: 
					
					 Now the UN recognizes that the "UN Command" has no relations with it. If the UN allows the U.S. continued abuse of the name of "UN Command", it is little short of conniving at the U.S. violation of the UN Charter. 
					
					 If the "UN Command" has "duty" and "authority" to take part in the administration of the Korean Armistice Agreement as contended by the U.S., the UN Security Council should politically and strategically govern the "UN Command" because the UNSC is in a position to provide political leadership over the use of armed forces under the UN Charter. 
					
					 Otherwise the UN Charter will continue to be misused as a tool for justifying the U.S. unilateral acts disguised as UN acts in the future, too. 
					
					 Websites of the Rostov Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Group for Solidarity with the DPRK and Rostov-Na-Donu Anti-Bourgeois Front of Russia and the Ukrainian internet paper Obektsivnaya Gazeta carried similar articles including the one titled "Illegal 'UN Command'" from Sept. 16 to 19.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para educadores
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para educadores
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el campo de construccion de las viviendas para los educadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					En los apartamentos de 44 y 36 pisos, que satisfacen la normativa figurativa y artistica de la arquitectura, estan acondicionadas tintoreria, bano publico y otras facilidades de servicios publicos y en sus alrededores hay un parque pequeno.
					
					En los 17o y 30o pisos del apartamento de 44 pisos y en los 14o y 27o del otro de 36 pisos estan los lugares en que los educadores y sus familiares puedan tomar descanso bajo techo.
					
					Durante su anterior visita de agosto pasado, el Mariscal dio instrucciones sobre los problemas que se presentan para terminar la obra, diciendo que se debe concluir la construccion de viviendas hasta el dia de fundacion del PTC para regalarlas a los educadores e investigadores.
					
					Presencio satisfecho el interior de la vivienda adornada de modo especifico con el azulejo colorado y el vidrio duro y recorrio varias casas del tercer piso del edificio no.2 haciendo conocimiento detallado del estado de ejecucion de la obra.
					
					En la habitacion comun, comedor, sala de estudio, cuarto de matrimonio y otros, dijo que estan amueblados bien segun el diseno aprobado, es bueno el material de suelo y parecen suaves el colorido y el dibujo del papel pegado a la pared.
					
					Prosiguio que se debe distribuir a todas las casas los televisores LED como se ha prometido y agrego que enviaria ademas los juegos de vasijas de varios tipos.
					
					Senalo que para facilitar el confort de los profesores y los investigadores en el estudio y la preparacion de lecciones en casa, deben colocar en la pared de la sala de estudio una mesa estante y en la del pasillo, un espejo redondo.
					
					Subiendo a cada piso, averiguo como marcha la construccion y llegado al 17o piso, recorrio el lugar de descanso bajo techo.
					
					Dijo que aqui los duenos de nuevas casas pueden pasear, leer y divertirse y los ninos tambien podran juguetear.
					
					Contemplo el panorama de la ciudad desde el balcon y se mostro alegre apuntando que estos apartamentos estan ubicados en buena posicion y la encrucijada de Ryonghung se hizo mas elegante al construirse estas nuevas casas.
					
					En la epoca actual de economia basada en intelectualidad y de competencia de cerebros, no hay nada que escatimar para los profesores e investigadores que forman a los cientificos que se encargaran del futuro de la patria.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los educadores de la Universidad alcanzaran mayores exitos en la ensenanza de generaciones venideras y la formacion de talentosos acorde al proposito del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el miembro del Buro Politico y secretario, del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ma Won Chun, el rector general de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Thae Hyong Chol, y el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Universidad Kim Il Sung, Kim Thae Hi.

articles.title: ACNC condena nuevo caso de lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC
articles.content:
ACNC condena nuevo caso de lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 29 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Bajo la proteccion de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas, Pak Sang Hak, representante de la "Federacion de Movimiento por el Norte Libre", Kim Song Min, representante de la "Radio del Norte Libre", el Prof. de la Universidad de Kyongmin de Seul, Kang Myong Do, y otros traidores a la nacion lanzaron el pasado dia 7, en visperas del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC hacia el territorio norcoreano desde el distrito de Kanghwa de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					Los autores del nuevo acto hostil son los que se fugaron al suelo surcoreano por sus antecedentes delictivos como asesinato, bandidaje, robo, desfalco de bienes publicos y corrupcion.
					
					Ahora, esos malvados repudiados hasta por sus paisanos y parientes se ponen al frente de la campana de enfrentamiento con la RPDC para mantener su sucia vida con las sumas miserables que les tiran EE.UU. y la banda conservadora surcoreana.
					
					Ya hemos advertido que puede ocurrirse un incidente de inimaginable consecuencia en las relaciones N-S debido a las locuras conflictivas de la chusma.
					
					Sin embargo, atemorizados ante el poderio de la RPDC, Estados Unidos y la camarilla surcoreana instigan a recrudecer el lanzamiento de volantes, como parte de la politica de confrontacion con la primera.
					
					Aunque las actuales autoridades surcoreanas hablan tanto de la supuesta "confianza", no hubo realmente ningun cambio en su intencion de insultar y enfrentarse con la RPDC.
					
					El aplazamiento del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur se debe tambien a los tipejos que a instigacion de las autoridades, ofendieron seriamente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC.
					
					Seran ridiculizadas y denunciadas las autoridades surcoreanas que protegen a los connotados profugos norcoreanos y los usan en su campana de enfrentamiento.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas ese crimen.
